title: Arranged Hearts
description: JoeyI married, and I did all the things asked of me.Then she ran away.That was the end of it, or so I thought.Until I found her again.This time, should I let her get away so easily?AdoraI was falling for my arranged husband hook, line, and sinker.He was everything I was not.And yet everything I didn’t know I needed.Until I was forced to run.I just hoped he didn’t catch me.Arranged Hearts is the 6th installment, in the Chained Hearts Duet world. This can be read as a second in the series after Reckless Hands.
author: T.L.  Smith
